full_summary:
**Conferencing and Operator Assisted Services (COAS) Tender Notice**
(request for proposals # P2P 105809)

**Notice Type:** [English] Request for Proposal, [French] Demande de propositions

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a service provider to deliver Conferencing and Operator Assisted Services (COAS) to the government.

**Scope of Work:**
Canada requires a cloud-based conferencing application platform for audio/web conferencing, operator-assisted audio conferencing, and a web-based service portal for Shared Services Canada. The contract period is intended to be 4 years, with 6 option periods of one year each.

**Tender Schedule:**

* Tender closing date: July 31, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Expected contract start date: July 22, 2025
* Expected contract end date: July 21, 2035

**Trade Agreements:**
The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender process:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Other relevant trade agreements

**Security Requirements:**
This procurement is subject to security requirements, including:

* Contract Security Program – Security Requirements Check List (SRCL)
* Supply Chain Security Information (SCI Assessment)
* Cloud Service Provider Information Technology Security (CSP ITS) Assessment

**Tender Evaluation:**
The selection criteria for this tender will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Directions to Tenderers:**

* Tenderers must follow the instructions outlined in the tender document.
* Responses must be submitted electronically to the contracting authority, Eric Vanasse (eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca) by the tender closing date.

**Attachments:**
A collection of relevant tender documents, amendments, and attachments are available on the Canada Buys website.

Note: Please ensure that you check the official government website for any updates or changes to the tender notice. [link to canada buys website] ) استعراض-Notice Type: [English] Request for Proposals, [French] Demande de propositions
